item.title: Google Quietly Releases New Feature Boost To Google Pixel Phones
item.description: Google Pixel 8 owners just got a major camera upgrade. Here is how Google is backporting a flagship Pixel 9 feature to millions of Pixel phones.

item.title: The No. 1 Reason You Keep Repeating The Same Relationship Pattern, By A Psychologist
item.description: Do your relationship patterns always feel familiar but painful? Psychological research may explain why your body keeps choosing it.
